revised_title: Titanium Oxide Fluted Spectrum and Antarian Stars
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine if the fluted spectrum of titanium oxide was responsible for the dark flutings in the spectra of Antarian or third type stars. They found that the flutings were produced by a compound of titanium with oxygen, and not by the metal itself. This discovery provided evidence of the presence of oxygen in Antarian stars and indicated that the source of the fluted absorption in these stars is at a temperature low enough to form chemical compounds.
